Translations.Text: Ante ut, nos granted Abraham his guidance understanding nos est fully aware de eum
He dictus to his patris his people Quod est these statues to quae vos devoting
They dictus Nos invenit noster parentes worshipping them
He dictus Indeed vos tuus parentes iit totally astray
They dictus vos telling nos truth vos playing
He dictus Tuus unus Dominus est Dominus de caelum terra created them. Hoc est testimony to quae ego bear testis
Ego juravit DEUS ego habet plan deal cum tuus statues vos sinister
He broke them into pieces absque pro big unus they refer it
They dictus Whoever perfecit hoc noster deus est really transgressor
They dictus Nos heard youth threaten them; he est alias Abraham
They dictus Bring eum eyes totus people they bear testis
They dictus vos perfecit hoc noster deus O Abraham
He dictus est big unus perfecit it Iit ask them si they speak
They taken aback dictus to Indeed vos est the unus transgressing
they reverted their veteris ideas Vos know foderator bene ut these non speak
He dictus vos tunc worship DEUS Perfecit quod non possesses power benefit vos harm vos
Vos incurred shame worshipping idols DEUS! Vos non understand
They dictus Burn eum support tuus deus hoc est quod vos decide perfecit
Nos dictus O fire est cool safe pro Abraham
Sic they schemed eum nos factus them losers
Nos saved eum nos saved Lot terra nos beatus totus people
Nos granted eum Isaac Jacob gift nos factus them ambo righteous
Nos factus them imams guided prout noster commandments nos taught them quam work righteousness quam observe Contact Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat)! To nos they devoted worshipers
Prout pro Lot nos granted eum wisdom knowledge nos saved eum ex community ut practiced abominations; they est wicked malus people
Nos admitted eum noster mercy he est righteous
